properties.areaDesc: Clinton, PA; Cameron, PA; Clearfield, PA; Centre, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 6:25AM EST until January 8 at 7:15AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania...
Northwestern Centre County in central Pennsylvania...
South central Cameron County in north central Pennsylvania...
Central Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania...

* Until 715 AM EST.

* At 625 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from Lock Haven to near Snow Shoe to Woodland to near New
Bethlehem, moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow.
Possible icy roadways.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the
Dubois and Milesburg exits, specifically from mile markers 97 to
153.

Locations impacted include...
DuBois, Clearfield, Sandy, Woodland, Curwensville, Penfield, Hyde,
Plymptonville, Rockton, Karthaus, Snow Shoe, Clarence, Moshannon,
Pine Glen, Monument, Lecontes Mills, S.B. Elliot State Park, Parker
Dam State Park, Morrisdale and Grassflat.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 7:15 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
